ca_ecoregion_central-coast.name: Central Coast
ca_ecoregion_central-coast.notes: Mediterranean coastal climate with dry summers and mild, wet winters.

ca_ecoregion_north-coast.name: North Coast
ca_ecoregion_north-coast.notes: Cooler coastal fog belt with higher rainfall and long growing season.

ca_ecoregion_south-coast.name: South Coast
ca_ecoregion_south-coast.notes: Warm coastal plain with long dry season and mild winters.

ca_ecoregion_central-valley.name: Central Valley
ca_ecoregion_central-valley.notes: Hot, dry summers and cool winters with a pronounced temperature swing.

ca_ecoregion_sierra-foothills.name: Sierra Foothills
ca_ecoregion_sierra-foothills.notes: Rolling foothills with cold winters, warm summers, and diverse microclimates.

ca_ecoregion_desert_sonoran.name: Sonoran Desert
ca_ecoregion_desert_sonoran.notes: Arid desert with intense sun and very low annual rainfall.
